message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $14,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? That's a very competitive price for a product of this caliber.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.
